channel.title: RSPS Over a Private Offline Network
channel.description: Hi, just wondering if anyone knows how to setup an RSPS to work over a private offline network. (Offline meaning not connected to the internet. Obviously.) Would it be something with sharing settings, or the actual code itself in the server and client? Thanks.

item.title: RSPS Over a Private Offline Network
item.dc:creator: @Soulxs Soulxs
item.description:
@Soulxs wrote:

Yes. Change the ip to “localhost”. If that doesnt work make it “127.0.0.1”

I got class now. If you still cannot figure it out hit me up with a pm containing your skype. Ill add you and help you out when i get back home

Read full topic
item.source: RSPS Over a Private Offline Network

item.title: RSPS Over a Private Offline Network
item.dc:creator: @EJ1 EJ
item.description:
@EJ1 wrote:

What is local host? Do you mean the exact words “local host”?

Read full topic
item.source: RSPS Over a Private Offline Network

item.title: RSPS Over a Private Offline Network
item.dc:creator: @Soulxs Soulxs
item.description:
@Soulxs wrote:

Search for the ip your server runs on and change it to localhost. That basicly means that only the pc you run it on can connect to it. Make sure you change it accordingly in the client.

Read full topic
item.source: RSPS Over a Private Offline Network
